queries.item: CREATE TABLE `?:cp_extended_tags_links` ( `tag_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL, `object_type` char(1) NOT NULL default 'O', `object_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL, `company_id` int(8), PRIMARY KEY (`object_type`,`object_id`,`tag_id`), KEY `tag_id` (`tag_id`), KEY `ids` (`tag_id`,`object_type`,`object_id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE `?:cp_extended_tags` ( `tag_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `tag` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `timestamp` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `status` char(1) NOT NULL default 'A', PRIMARY KEY (`tag_id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
ALTER TABLE ?:promotions ADD tags VARCHAR(1) NOT NULL default 'N'
